scripts.start:frontend: npm run verify && cd frontend && npm start
scripts.build:frontend: npm run verify && cd frontend && npm run build
scripts.test:frontend: npm run verify && cd frontend && npm test
scripts.start:backend: npm run verify && cd backend && npm start
scripts.build:backend: npm run verify && cd backend && npm run build
scripts.dev:backend: npm run verify && cd backend && npm run dev
scripts.postinstall: npm run verify && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
